accumulatedCurrentProsperity(uint256).details: Uses buildings productions to forecast amount of prosperity will settlement will have at specified time

params.timestamp: Time at which calculate current prosperity

returns._0: Amount of prosperity at specified time

addGovernor(address).details: Settlement owner and other governor can add governor

params._governorAddress: Address to add as the governor

assignResourcesAndWorkersToBuilding(addr.details: Assigns resources+workers to building in single transactionIf resourcesOwner == address(0) -> resources will be taken from msg.senderIf resourcesOwner != address(0) and resourcesOwner has given allowance to msg.sender >= resourcesAmount -> resources will be taken from resourcesOwner

calculateCurrentHealthAndDamage(uint256).details: Uses fort production and siege parameters to forecast health and damage will be dealt at specified time

returns.damage: Amount of damage dealt from fort.production.lastUpdateState to specified timestamp

epoch().details: Value is dereferenced from proxy storage and world

extendProsperity(uint256).details: Even though function is opened it can be called only by world or world asset

params.prosperityAmount: Amount of prosperity to which extend current prosperity

getCurrentSiegePower().details: Updated when army add/remove units from siege

returns._0: Amount of total siege power at current time

getSettlementOwner().details: Settlements owner is considered an address, which holds ownerTokenId NFT

init(uint256,address,uint32).details: Called by factory contract which creates current instance

params.createdWithOwnerTokenId: Banner token id to which current settlement belongs
params.settlementPosition: Position on which settlement is created
params.zoneAddress: Zone address to which this settlement belongs

isRuler(address).details: Settlements ruler is an address which owns settlement or an address(es) by which settlement is/are governed

returns._0: Banner, whether specified address is ruler or not

newBuilding(string).details: All buildings are created on settlement creation

removeGovernor(address).details: Only settlement owner can remove governor

removeGovernors().details: Only settlement owner can remove all governors

swapProsperityForExactWorkers(uint256,ui.details: Only ruler or world asset can perform swap

params._maxProsperityToSell: Maximum amount of prosperity to spend for exact workers
params._workersToBuy: Exact amount of workers to buy

updateFortHealth(uint256,bool).details: Even though function is opened it can be called only by world or world asset

params.healthDiff: Health delta between current value and new value
params.isProduced: Banner, whether health is produced or removed

withdrawResources(string,address,uint256.details: In case if someone accidentally transfers game resource to the settlement

world().details: Value is dereferenced from proxy storage

buildings.details: Types of buildings supported can be queried from registry

currentZone.details: Immutable, initialized on the settlement creation

extraProsperity.details: Used for determination amount of real prosperity this settlement has

ownerTokenId.details: Immutable, initialized on the settlement creation

position.details: Immutable, initialized on the settlement creation

siege.details: If any army is sieging settlement not address(0), otherwise address(0)

NewArmy(address,uint32).notice: Emitted when settlements army is created, is it created on settlement creation

NewBuilding(address,string).notice: Emitted when new building is placed, all building are placed on settlement creation

SiegeCreated(address).notice: Emitted when siege is created on settlement if not present. During settlements lifetime multiple sieges can be created (one after another, not multiple simultaneously)

accumulatedCurrentProsperity(uint256).notice: Calculates current prosperity at specified timestamp

army().notice: Settlements army Immutable, initialized on the settlement creation

assignResourcesAndWorkersToBuilding(addr.notice: Transfers game resources from msg.sender and workers from settlement to building

calculateCurrentHealthAndDamage(uint256).notice: Calculates current fort health and damage dealt at specified timestamp

currentZone().notice: Zone to which this settlement belongs

extendProsperity(uint256).notice: Extends current settlement prosperity by specified amount

extraProsperity().notice: Extra prosperity amount gained from demilitarization of any army on this settlement

getCurrentSiegePower().notice: Calculates total siege power presented at current time

isRuler(address).notice: Calculates whether provided address is settlement ruler or not

massUpdate().notice: Applies production of every building which produces prosperity

ownerTokenId().notice: Banner token id to which current settlement belongs

position().notice: Position on which settlement is created

swapProsperityForExactWorkers(uint256,ui.notice: Swaps current settlement prosperity for exact workers

updateCurrentHealth().notice: Updates settlement health to current block

withdrawResources(string,address,uint256.notice: Withdraws game resources from settlement to specified address
